hero.title: Akamara
hero.subtitle: Before time, Akamara
hero.desc: Akamara is born as a multi-service ecosystem in Cuba. From professional furniture manufacturing to integral logistics and construction solutions.

estrategia.title: Strategy
estrategia.subtitle: Orula / The Board
estrategia.desc: Strategic consulting and project management. Akamara's oracle for smart decisions and sustainable success.
estrategia.vision: Orunmila's wisdom guides every commercial decision, transforming uncertainty into clear and prosperous destinations.

mobiliario.title: Furniture
mobiliario.subtitle: Yemayá / The Form
mobiliario.desc: Design and manufacture of high-standard furniture. Precious woods and luxury finishes for spaces that flow like the sea.
mobiliario.vision: Like Yemayá's embrace, our spaces flow with elegance and serenity, creating dream homes and hotels.

construccion.title: Construction
construccion.subtitle: Shangó / Strength
construccion.desc: Civil work execution and finishes with structural solidity. Creative energy and power of realization.
construccion.vision: Shangó's unstoppable force materializes in solid structures, combining the power of the work with the beauty of lightning.

gastronomia.title: Gastronomy
gastronomia.subtitle: Olokun / Depth
gastronomia.desc: Institutional food and events. Culinary treasures from the depths of flavor and quality.
gastronomia.vision: From the depths of Olokun's secrets emerge banquets that nourish the soul and elevate any celebration.

logistica.title: Logistics
logistica.subtitle: Eshú / The Path
logistica.desc: Specialized fleet and 360 logistics. Opening paths and ensuring every cargo reaches its destination with precision.
logistica.vision: Eshú opens the paths and ensures each resource flows without obstacles across Cuban geography.

legal_section.subtitle: Legal Alchemy
legal_section.desc: We operate under the legal framework of the Republic of Cuba as a Single-Member Limited Liability Company (S.U.R.L.), guaranteeing security in every commercial transaction.
legal_section.nit_desc: Active and certified commercial and tax registration.
legal_section.mission_desc: "To be the catalyst for business development in Cuba through an ecosystem of comprehensive services that prioritizes artisanal quality and technical efficiency."

furniture_section.desc: Our furniture division fuses comfort with architectural design. We create pieces that dress hotel lobbies, residential spaces, and restaurants with exclusive finishes.

contact_section.subtitle: Our experts are ready to advise you on any of our operating divisions.

legal_info.title: 1. Legal & Corporate Information
legal_info.intro: In compliance with current regulations in the Republic of Cuba for new economic actors, users are informed that this website is owned and operated by:

values.framework: Decree-Law 46/2021 on Micro, Small, and Medium Enterprises.

legal_info.closing: The commercial activity of AKAMARA S.U.R.L. is strictly governed by the Constitution of the Republic of Cuba and complementary laws regulating self-employment and non-state management forms.

privacy.title: 2. Privacy Policy & Data Treatment
privacy.intro: AKAMARA S.U.R.L. is committed to the protection and absolute confidentiality of data provided by its clients and users.

confidentiality.title: Confidentiality:
confidentiality.desc: Personal data (name, email, phone) collected through contact forms or the smart chat will be used exclusively for commercial communication and service provision purposes.

no_transfer.title: Non-Transfer:
no_transfer.desc: Under no circumstances do we sell, rent, or transfer client data to third parties, except upon express requirement by competent legal and judicial authorities of the Republic of Cuba.

security.title: Digital Security:
security.desc: We implement technical security measures (SSL encryption, secure databases) to prevent unauthorized access, loss, or alteration of your data.

disclaimer.title: 3. Disclaimer of Liability
disclaimer.intro: BY USING THIS WEBSITE AND OUR DIGITAL SERVICES, YOU ACCEPT THE FOLLOWING CONDITIONS:

accuracy.title: 3.1 Information Accuracy:
accuracy.desc: Although we strive to keep information updated, technical details, prices, and service availability may vary without prior notice due to the dynamics of the Cuban market. Images are for illustrative purposes.

technical.title: 3.2 Technical Failures:
technical.desc: AKAMARA S.U.R.L. is not responsible for damages, losses, or harm derived from system, server, or internet failures, nor for computer viruses that may infect the user's equipment as a result of accessing or using the site.

ai.title: 3.3 Use of Chatbot (AI):
ai.desc: Responses provided by our virtual assistant ("Ori AI" or "Yunior GPT") are generated by artificial intelligence. While trained to be accurate, they do not constitute binding legal or contractual advice. Always verify critical information with our human staff.

external.title: 3.4 External Links:
external.desc: We are not responsible for the content, policies, or practices of third-party websites linked from our platform.

ip.title: 4. Intellectual Property
ip.desc: All content on this site (logos, texts, designs, source code) is the exclusive property of AKAMARA S.U.R.L. or has the corresponding use licenses. Total or partial reproduction regarding this content is prohibited without express written authorization.
